useCase.name: Execute Action Navigation
useCase.description: This use case describes the navigation from actor to various components.

mainSequence.step: Foo1 navigates to the boundary Foo2.
Foo1 accesses the control component Foo3.
Foo1 interacts with the entity Foo4.
Foo1 connects to the database component Foo5.
Foo1 operates with the collections component Foo6.
